actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the Foreign Gifts and Decorations Act of 1966 with respect to the definition of the term "person" as used in such act.

summary.text: Revises the provisions of the Foreign Gifts and Decorations Act so that the term "person" includes members of the family "or" household of government and military personnel instead of members of the family and household. (Amends 22 U.S.C. 262).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the Foreign Gifts and Decorations Act of 1966 with respect to the definition of the term "person" as used in such act.
